meta.job_title: Customer Experience Guide-Part Time Fixed Term

duties_responsibilities.duty: Engage with customers to determine and meet their specific needs with kindness and creativity.
Ensure accuracy in all point-of-sale operations and handle product returns in the spirit of the organization's policy.
Accurately fulfill online orders and inventory transfers.
Merchandise the store during downtimes: folding, hanging, steaming, and stocking.
Assist in training of fellow employees.
Utilize allotted environmental-activism hours, inspire customers to get involved, and participate in the annual local granting process.
Use the company’s mission and core values as guides for decision making, and act as a brand advocate inside and outside of the store.
Extend invitations for future brand engagement and maintain a positive attitude.
Support and strive to achieve all store goals.
Demonstrate quality in all tasks, practicing security measures to prevent theft and handling shoplifters safely.
Participate in all required training, aim to teach and learn something every day, and welcome feedback for personal growth.
Perform physical requirements of the role, including standing/walking, reaching overhead, lifting, carrying, and store maintenance duties.
Be available to work varying hours, including holidays and weekends.
